timeline.body:
I wanted to assert that [HttpWebHandlerAdapter#handleUnresolvedError](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-framework/blob/v5.2.7.RELEASE/spring-web/src/main/java/org/springframework/web/server/adapter/HttpWebHandlerAdapter.java#L271) is never invoked due to CancelledSubscriptionException,
but couldn't find an appropriate way to test it...
(I looked for a way to test logEvent of HttpWebHandlerAdapter's `log`, but failed to do that)

It would be very helpful if I can get some advices here
